section.title: Managing Analysis Runs
section.para: As soon as an Analysis Project is created (see Handling Analysis Projects ), an analysis is started, a so called Analysis Run. By selecting an Analysis Project, in Analysis Runs view the list of analysis runs of a project are shown.

section.title: Starting a new Analysis Run
section.para: A new Analysis Run is started simply by selecting the Add... button. A new Analysis Run is started and appears as soon as it is finished. The progress can be checked in the Progress View.

section.title: Deleting an Analysis Run
section.para: To delete an Analysis Run, the run needs to be selected in Analysis Runs View. With button Delete... and a verification of the choice, the Analysis Run is deleted.

section.title: Editing Analysis Runs
section.para: To edit an Analysis Run, the Analysis Run needs to be selected in Analysis Runs View. With button Edit... the Analyis Run Edit dialog is opened.
